channel.title: Hi, I´m Christian founder of Monitae, a new Team Acceleration application
channel.description:
Hi there! I was recommended to join bootstrapped.fm, this place looks great.
Happy to share stories about my experience building and running Monitae, a new Team Acceleration tool, from Spain. Looking forward to being a part of this community!
